title: I feel bad for...bruiser players?
body:
I dont even play and in fact hate bruisers with every inch of my life, but how in the hell do you beat {{champion:150}} ?

Why does he need a super long ranged low cd zero cost slow?

Why does he do % max hp magic damage AND get a massive speed boost for as a passive?

Why does he need a huge jump if he already has a ranged slow AND speed boost, again for free?

Its like Riot gave him every single possible tool to f*ck over bruisers.

ADCs are crying, wondering why he has far superior kiting tools then them.

I already hate him cuz in his mega form he jumps in and 1 shots me while CCing me infinitely (balanced) but what the hell do you bruiser players do vs him?

replies.body:
Play someone who can out-damage or out-sustain his poke, like Darius or Illaoi. Bait out his E, and then go all in on him and kill him before he goes mega form. When he goes mega form, just back off.

Or play someone like Irelia / Pantheon, and just jump on him and CC him to death.

Or play Wukong and poke him all day, then kill him when he gets low enough.

Or play Ekko and just balance him to death, same with Yasuo.

Or play Riven and laugh as he tries to kite you since you don't walk more than two steps at a time.

Plenty of ways to beat him.

> [{quoted}](name=Sciela,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=43nh536V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-01T23:19:17.411+0000)
>
> Play someone who can out-damage or out-sustain his poke, like Darius

lol
Yeah, well, go try it. He goes in to auto you, you scare him into jumping and grab him as he lifts off the ground, he goes nowhere, you kill him. Blamo, dead Gnar.

> [{quoted}](name=Sciela,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=43nh536V,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-10-02T00:12:21.883+0000)
>
> Yeah, well, go try it. He goes in to auto you, you scare him into jumping and grab him as he lifts off the ground, he goes nowhere, you kill him. Blamo, dead Gnar.

How do you scare him into jumping? 

Your Q is the only ability that can outrange his auto attacks at any point in the laning phase (and once Gnar hits six, no ability outranges his autos), and that has a wind up that doesn't actually allow you to cast your E when he would jump to avoid it. This is assuming he even needs to use it, considering the speed boost he gets from his W. 

The scenario as you described does not exist if both players are playing even sort of competently.

How to scare him into jumping: Run at him. All there is to it. He cannot fight you face to face, and he will run. If you use W, he's more than likely to jump away and save himself the damage.

If he tries to kite you, just sidestep his Q and then W and kill him. If he tries to fight, well, you're Darius. 

His Q isn't targeted, it's a skillshot. Don't act as if you get hit by it 100% of the time.

> [{quoted}](name=Sciela,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=43nh536V,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-02T03:08:59.478+0000)
>
> How to scare him into jumping: Run at him. All there is to it. He cannot fight you face to face, and he will run. If you use W, he's more than likely to jump away and save himself the damage.
> 
> If he tries to kite you, just sidestep his Q and then W and kill him. If he tries to fight, well, you're Darius. 
> 
> His Q isn't targeted, it's a skillshot. Don't act as if you get hit by it 100% of the time.

If you have to side-step his Q, he has procced Hyper on you (he can probably do it without you having to side step since Gnar) by then, which gives him more movement speed than you, which means you can't catch him. Meanwhile you're eating free damage while you're trying to run through his minion wave (did you forget that he has one of those?) to kill him, and even if you do hit him said minion wave will be beating your ass the entire time.

Once again, the scenario you are describing doesn't actually exist.

At desperate times, you need desperate measures

Call upon your inner Urgod
Play something with a gap closer. But yeah, as a Singed main, I'm getting real sick of Gnar and pokey top laners in general.

He has a slow, speed boost, AND a jump.

Your one gap closer isnt good enough for that.

Adc's are supposed to kite as a skill not get kiteing tools thats why so many of them have a bunch of mobility and cc tools while getting movement speed  buffed from zeal. and when they get good teammates who cant have damage in their kits because they have cc or mobility but adcs get to blend the 3 together adcs dont even have to kite. the skill is only really useful out side of team fights where adcs should be weak. but arent
nothing quite like worlds for rolling out bandwagons
All Bruisers that don't have some huge defensive cool down or amazing sustain or are a Jugg have been forced into the Jungle to be honest.
What Juggs beyond Mordekaiser go in the jungle?
